title: Foxit security advisory (AV25-510)
description: On August 13, 2025, Foxit published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Foxit PDF Editor for Mac  multiple versions
Foxit PDF Reader (Windows)  version 2025.1.0.27937 and prior
Foxit PDF Reader for Mac  version 2025.1.0.66692 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
